Articles.Content:
Well with the help off a few people here, i wa able to get working elerons built, but now i have another set of silly questions,

FLAPS, are they similar in the setting up process in Unity?

Volets, basically a leading edge flap, Similar?

(Does anyone know if there is a working Variable VTOL engine mod?) The AV8 has a need for such a set up.

"Niles"
